snippet.title: X4: Tides of Avarice & 5.00 Update Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
➡️ Find X4: Tides of Avarice here:
▪️ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1701060/X4_Tides_of_Avarice/ 
▪️ GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/x4_tides_of_avarice

Trailer by Répási Tamás (@Tomonor Productions)
Music: "Inertia" from the X4: Tides of Avarice soundtrack (preview ➡️ https://youtu.be/pp9aRlUhbzM)

There is just one week to go until the release of X4: Tides of Avarice on March 14, 2022. Today we present to you our Launch Trailer, which showcases both the new expansion and the accompanying 5.00 update for X4: Foundations that will be released on the same day.

🪐  X4: Tides of Avarice, the third expansion for X4: Foundations, invites you on new exploration adventures. Encountering and interacting with previously unknown, lawless pirate and scavenger factions, will challenge your perception of social order and justice in the X universe. In new sectors and dangerous regions, you will not only discover new ships and stations, but also encounter stellar phenomena that will significantly influence your plans and actions. What is it all about, and who are the mysterious manipulators that have learned to master a rare and vital resource? Your journey will lead you towards the answers. Set out and discover a new chapter of X4: Foundations.

➡️ Join us:
▪️ Community: https://forum.egosoft.com
▪️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/EGOSOFT
▪️ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EgosoftGmbH/
▪️ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/X4Foundations/
▪️ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/egosoftofficial/
▪️ Discord: https://discord.gg/EZtS4Ya88D
